p: After an overnight reaction, the mixture is vacuum-filtered using a Büchner assembly and a nylon filter with a 0.22-µm pore size. The modified powder is successively washed with DMF and acetone. Modified carbon powders are washed with deionized water until a neutral pH is reached, followed by DMF and acetone washing. Finally, the modified powders are vacuum-dried at 100 °C for at least one day before utilization.
